data.Name: Khemmis
data.Bio: Slow, loud, heavy -- this is Khemmis, a four piece doomed rock 'n' roll outfit from Denver, Colorado. Khemmis combines the soul of Black Sabbath, the soaring harmonies of Thin Lizzy and Iron Maiden, and the visceral weight of contemporary sludge and doom metal. No regurgitation. No gimmicks. No trends. In July 2015, the band released Absolution, a six track, forty-minute journey through transcendent melodies and pure auditory annihilation.
